title: #149: The Price of Medical Tyranny | Tim Ray
description:
Tim Ray, the founder of UI Media Network and the host of Frequency Wars, is attacking the false narrative crafted by the Mainstream Media and Big Pharma with a combination of facts, expert guests, world-renowned doctors, and grassroots activism.

Not everybody is passively allowing themselves to be lied to by the press, some are standing up and bringing awareness to the battle that many people are not even aware is raging all around them.

Through his work interviewing the top doctors in the world in the area of infectious diseases, Tim has come to a much different conclusion than most others in the media, and where he sees this medical fascism heading is alarming.
